page.title: 09Recreation
page.content: There is a sports field at Redhill and another at Felton,part of which is in this area.Also at Redhill there are a youth club and village club in the village hall,skittles and darts teams, the Women's Institute,the Redhill Circle and a pub-The Darlington Arms. Dances and discos are held in the village hall and the village has two football teams which play at Felton. Motorbike scrambling takes place near Scars Wood and there is some clay pigeon shooting near Redhill. Apart from this there is little organized recreation.There are many footpaths and bridleways for walkers and riders, and several families own their own horses and ponies. One footpath leads from Winter Lane, Redhill to Goblin Combe which is a nature reserve(just out of our area). Gardening is a very popular pastime.
